User.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS User (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) SECONDARY KEY, forname VARCHAR(255) SECONDARY KEY, username VARCHAR(255), password VARCHAR(255))

Patient.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Patient (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) SECONDARY KEY, forname VARCHAR(255) SECONDARY KEY, birthday DATE, about VARCHAR(510))

Session.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Session (id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT SECONDARY KEY, user_id INT SECONDARY KEY, session_type INT, session_date DATE, session_time TIME)
